column4: Had enough of this 64-bit ver. takes too long to startup numerous apps that won't run. DAMN, its the only ver. that will find all my memory.
Yah, running a new shuttle xpc with 4 gb ram 320gb hd 22" samsung lcd and intel core 2 duo 2.13..... not to shabby.
no not stock running a nvidia 7200 I think maybe a 7600 whatever its a 256 pci-x kinda a waste on ubuntu but hey
anyone know if you can run xchat without a desktop (command-line) that would be cool
